headline: Digital Workers Have Arrived in Banking
summary: Financial services companies like BNY and JPMorgan say AI’s capabilities are taking more and more cues from the way humans work.

headline: US judge orders Argentina, facing $16.1 billion judgment, to give up YPF stake
summary: A U.S. judge on Mondayordered Argentina to give up its 51% stake in oil and gascompany YPF to partially satisfy a $16.1 billioncourt judgment, handing a defeat to the cash-strapped country. ...
